Text Mining of Permanent Downhole Gauges

Vignette Author

2019-01-10

Source: vignettes/permanent_downhole_gauge.Rmd
permanent_downhole_gauge.Rmd
library(petro.One)
library(tm)
## Loading required package: NLP
my_url <- make_search_url(query = "Permanent Downhole Gauge", 
                          how = "all")        

get_papers_count(my_url)    # how many papers total
## [1] 602
papers_by_type(my_url)      # papers by type
## # A tibble: 3 x 2
##   name             value
##   <chr>            <dbl>
## 1 Conference paper   514
## 2 Journal paper       84
## 3 Presentation         4
# create a dataframe of papers found
df <- read_multidoc(my_url)
df
## # A tibble: 602 x 6
##    book_title            paper_id  dc_type  authors             year source
##    <fct>                 <fct>     <fct>    <chr>              <int> <fct> 
##  1 Encouraging Experien~ SPE-1283~ confere~ Igbokoyi, A.O., S~  2009 SPE   
##  2 Permanent Downhole G~ SPE-1226~ confere~ Horng, Chen Jiun,~  2009 SPE   
##  3 Reservoir Management~ SPE-9097~ confere~ de Oliveira Silva~  2004 SPE   
##  4 Pressure Transient A~ SPE-1637~ confere~ Al-hashim, Hasan ~  2013 SPE   
##  5 Wavelet Filtering of~ SPE-1230~ confere~ Pico, Carlos, | A~  2009 SPE   
##  6 Comparative Analysis~ SPE-1724~ confere~ Enyekwe, A.E., Un~  2014 SPE   
##  7 Permanent Downhole G~ IPTC-181~ confere~ Pham, Hoanh Van, ~  2014 IPTC  
##  8 Interpreting Pressur~ SPE-1472~ confere~ Liu, Yang, Stanfo~  2011 SPE   
##  9 Pressure Transient A~ SPE-1891~ confere~ Zubarev, Denis, A~  2017 SPE   
## 10 Analyzing Simultaneo~ SPE-1100~ confere~ Rai, Himansu, Che~  2007 SPE   
## # ... with 592 more rows
library(petro.One)

term_freq <- term_frequency(df)
term_freq
## # A tibble: 1,238 x 2
##    word       freq
##    <chr>     <dbl>
##  1 well        200
##  2 reservoir   167
##  3 field       144
##  4 data        109
##  5 product      98
##  6 pressur      97
##  7 complet      92
##  8 downhol      92
##  9 use          84
## 10 gas          78
## # ... with 1,228 more rows
library(petro.One)

plot_wordcloud(df, max.words = 100, min.freq = 15)

Bar plot

plot_bars(df, min.freq = 25)

dendogram

plot_relationships(df, min.freq = 25, threshold = 0.1)

library(cluster)   
tdm <- get_term_document_matrix(df)$tdm

tdm.rst <- removeSparseTerms(tdm, 0.93)

d <- dist(tdm.rst, method="euclidian")   
fit <- hclust(d=d, method="complete")   # for a different look try substituting: method="ward.D"
fit 
## 
## Call:
## hclust(d = d, method = "complete")
## 
## Cluster method   : complete 
## Distance         : euclidean 
## Number of objects: 17
plot(fit, hang = 1)
